ygData.subject: Re: Week end adventures
ygData.msgSnippet: No bother at all, I actually found it a nice change from the normal subjects here. Most of the reason I play the game is for adventure and fun .... not to
ygData.messageBody:
No bother at all, I actually found it a nice
change from the normal subjects here. Most of the
reason I play the game is for adventure and fun
.... not to figure out what weapon does the most
damage.

Thanks for the nice break from warrior drizzle.

-Rosmorte


Tom Swift wrote:

> Sorry this was meant for my groups mailing
> list...didn't mean to spam.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Swift <tswift@...>
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 12:49 PM
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Week end
> adventures
> I died alot this weekend. Bad luck,
> incompetence of others, various other
> reasons. I only made a net result of
> half bubble all weekend. I did get my
> shiny brass halberd. After twice
> getting the kill for the halberd
> stolen from me, I ended up buying a
> halberd from the kill-stealing wiz for
> 100p. An excellent price. I could
> make a hefty profit selling it. But I
> am keeping it :) I also travelled
> through the Karanas, North, south, and
> east. I also checked out Queynos hill,
> Surefall glades and Blackburrow.
> Didn't really wander black burrow at
> all. Fear of trains and other recent
> deaths made me choose not to stay. I
> found the Karanas to be full of
> excellent prey. I may get bound to
> Queynos and do some hunting there.
> Unfortunately the zone to Highpass
> from East Karanas is about 10 minutes
> long. Most zones have those tunnels,
> this one makes the tunnel from Ro to
> East commons look short. So binding in
> Highpass is an option, but the East
> Karanas is dangerous. Alot of things
> there that will kill you dead.
> Cyclops, hill giants, high level
> gnolls, griffons and more. I killed a
> griffawn, a lower level griffon while
> I was there....oh that felt so good.
> It was a close fight and I nearly died
> but it was oh so worth it. Can't
> wait till I can kill a full size
> griffon. North Karanas I think had
> centaurs....which are pretty cool.
> They are indifferent to me, but I
> attacked one to see what kind of loot
> and how tought they were. This one
> was a centaur foal and a low blue to
> me. I ended up zoning...the whole
> time I was running it was shooting
> arrows at me! Oh now that was no
> fun. I also killed a scarecrow...now
> those are very cool looking. They do
> require magic to damage though....like
> a wisp. I partied last night in
> Lavastorm.....it was kind of nice to
> return. That is where I made all the
> exp back that I lost over the
> weekend. I didn't check my loot yet
> but it was fun. Also hit Najena. Man
> that place has changed. I could walk
> unmolested all the way to the big sign
> inside that says NAJENA. The terrors
> were camped as bad as anywhere else.
> Explored a bit more than we have
> before and found a room full of dark
> boned skeletons. Quite unpleasant
> creatures I can tell you. Also fought
> some cool opponents like a dark elf
> magician NPC. She was a bitch because
> she had a tough pet. We lost someone
> on that fight and she was blue to us
> all.
>
